p: 2) Results, “Prevalence of HIV-1 Drug Resistance” paragraph. The authors stated that the PDR prevalence in rural and urban setting is 12.9% and 6.7%, respectively. It is not clear if this prevalence reflects the number of patients carrying at least one drug resistance. Please, clarify. The authors should also define clearly the number of patients carrying at least one NRTI and NNRTI mutation.
